post.description: Add Extended Properties on the current cart. Store an arbitrary number of cart extended properties such as tracking strings, marketing sources, affiliates, sales personnel/data, and so on, on a per cart basis. Each cart may have none, one, or more than one entry in the extended properties collection, and all values in the extended properties collection are represented as strings. When you create an order from a cart, all extended properties are retained from the cart and copied to the order.

get.description: Retrieves a list of channels according to any specified filter criteria and sort options. All orders include a channel association that enables the company to perform financial reporting for each defined channel. Because channels are managed at the tenant level, you must associate all the tenant's sites with a channel. Sites that do not have a defined channel association cannot successfully submit orders.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description:
Used to page results from a query. Indicates the zero-based offset in the complete result set where the returned entities begin. 
            For example, with a PageSize of 25, to get the 51st through the 75th items, startIndex=3. The default value is 0. Optional.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Used to page results from a query. Indicates the maximum number of entities to return from a query. The default value is 20 and the maximum value is 200. Optional.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The element to sort the results by and the channel in which the results appear. Either ascending (a-z) or descending (z-a) channel. Optional.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
A set of filter expressions representing the search parameters for a query: eq=equals, ne=not equals, gt=greater than, lt = less than or equals, 
            gt = greater than or equals, lt = less than or equals, sw = starts with, or cont = contains. Optional.

requestBody.description: All properties of the channel to place.

post.description: Sets the action of the specified payment transaction interaction. Available actions depend on the current status of the payment transaction. \r\nIf in doubt, get a list of available payment actions first (such as AuthAndCapture, AuthorizePayment, CapturePayment, VoidPayment, CreditPayment, RequestCheck, ApplyCheck, or DeclineCheck). Note that for order management-only systems that use No-Operation payment gateways, such as due to the payments being processed by an external storefront or service instead of UCP, these actions will not actually be performed by UCP and instead will be automatically marked as a success.

put.description: Modifies a category such as moving it to another location in the category tree, or changing whether it is visible on the storefront. This PUT replaces the existing resource, so be sure to include all the information that you want to maintain for the category. Any unspecified properties are set to null.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the category that you want to modify. Required.

parameters.name: cascadeVisibility
parameters.description: If true, when changing the display option for the category, change it for all subcategories also. Optional.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the category that you want to delete.

parameters.name: cascadeDelete
parameters.description: If true, any subcategories of a category are deleted when this category is deleted. Otherwise only the given category is deleted. Default is false.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: If true, category (and optionally subcategories) will be deleted even if there are products referecing them.  Default is false.

parameters.name: reassignToParent
parameters.description: If true, and child categories of the given category will be reassigned to the parent of the given category. Only applies if cascadeDelete is false. Default is false.

Optional. A set of filter expressions representing the search parameters for a query:
            eq=equals, ne=not equals, gt=greater than, lt = less than, gt = greater than or equals, le = less than or equals,
            sw = starts with, or cont = contains.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description:
Optional. Used to page results from a query.
            Indicates the zero-based offset in the complete result set where the returned entities begin.
            For example, with a pageSize of 25, to get the 51st through the 75th items, startIndex=3.
            The default value is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Optional. Used to page results from a query.
            Indicates the maximum number of entities to return from a query. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 200.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
The element to sort the results by and the order in which the results appear.
            Either ascending order (a-z) which accepts 'asc' or 'ASC' or descending order (z-a) which accepts 'desc' or 'DESC'.
            The sortBy parameter follows an available property.
            For example, to sort results by category ID ascending, use sortBy=categoryId asc.

itemCount.description: Number of items in the active cart.

totalQuantity.description: Total quantity of all items in the cart

total.description: Total cost of items in the active cart.

isExpired.description:
If true, the cart has reached its expiration date (Cart.ExpirationDate) and considered abandoned. 
Carts of anonymous shoppers expire after 14 days of inactivity.

hasActiveCart.description: If true, the cart is active. A shopper has added an item to a cart.

CartSummary.description: Cart summary, which is the number of items in the active cart, total cost of items in the cart, and whether the cart has expired.

isDestinationCommercial.description: Indicates that the destination is commercial

shippingMethodCode.description:
Code that uniquely identifies the shipping method such as "Ground," "Overnight," or "Digital."
The site's shipping settings lists the valid shipping methods specified for this site.

shippingMethodName.description: Readable name of the shipping method

data.description: Custom data originated by the shipping service.

FulfillmentInfo.description:
Shipment information, which includes the shipping address, price, estimated delivery date, tracking information, method (for example, Ground, Overnight, or Pick-up), 
carrier (for example, USPS, UPS, FedEx), and current status (for example, Not Shipped, In Transit, Delayed, or Returned To Sender).

id.description: Unique identifier of the discount.

name.description: Name of the discount in the language specified by LocaleCode.

itemIds.description: List of discounts for each order item.

expirationDate.description: Date when the discount expires. Default is null (no expiration date).

hasMultipleTargetProducts.description:
Indicates that the discount targets more than a product.  Used
primarily for BoGa discounts with multiple targets.

CommerceRuntimeDiscount.description:
Discounts that apply to the order, if any. For example, when the 
subtotal of the order exceeds a certain amount, or for free shipping.

impact.description: Value of the discount applied. This is a negative number to be subtracted from the original price to get the final price.

couponCode.description: Code of the coupon associated with the discount if a coupon code is required to get the discount.

excluded.description: Determines whether or not this discount is set up to be ignored by the pricing runtime.

CommerceRuntimeAppliedDiscount.description:
Discount applied to the order, which is a negative number to be subtracted from the original price to get the final price. 
If multiple discounts for the order exist, this is the value most advantageous to the shopper.

id.description: Unique identifier of the  message. System-supplied. Read-only.

userId.description: User Id that identifies the user that performed the related change

appId.description: App Id that identifies the user that performed the related change

subjectType.description: Subject of the message, for example, "Product." System-supplied. Read-only.

success.description: Indicates if the message is related to a success or failure.

identifier.description: Unique identifier to what the message pertains, which can be a cart item, cart or another generic entity. System-supplied. Read-only.

subject.description: Text on the subject line of the message, for example, the product name. System-supplied. Read-only.

verb.description:
Action applicable to the message. This can be "Increased," when the product price has increased, "Decreased," when the 
product price has decreased, and "Invalidated," when the product is no longer available. System-supplied. Read-only.

metadata.description: Data. This property will be a JSON array that will contain 0-N items, when there is 1 item it will still be an array containing only one item. System-supplied. Read-only.

oldValue.description: Original price of the item. System-supplied. Read-only.

newValue.description: Current price of the item. System-supplied. Read-only.

amount.description: Monetary amount that pertains to the change if applicable

createDate.description: When the message was created. System-supplied. Read-only.

attributes.description: Additional Data. This property will be a Dictionary of objects.

CommerceRuntimeChangeMessage.description: A message displayed by the system based on the last  action, for example, when a product price has changed. System-supplied and read-only.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the shopper who created the cart.

id.description: Unique identifier of the CommerceAggregate object (e.g. order, cart, wishlist, etc.).

channelCode.description: Unique identifier of the channel for this item.

currencyCode.description: ISO Currency Code. Currently, only USD is supported.

visitId.description: Identifies the Visit ID that was current when the order was placed or when the cart was last updated.

webSessionId.description: Identifies the web session used to place the order or last update the cart.

customerInteractionType.description:
Determines the interaction type that a customer will use to create this object.
Valid values are: Website, Store, Call, Unknown

orderDiscounts.description: The discount that has been applied to the cart itself. If multiple discounts exist, this is the discount that the system applies because it offers the best savings for the shopper. This is a negative number.

data.description: Custom data for a given vendor set within the commerce process.

taxData.description: Storage for any additional/custom tax data.

subtotal.description: Combined price for all cart items, including all selected options but excluding any discounts.

discountedSubtotal.description: Combined price for all cart items, including all selected options as well as any discounts.

discountTotal.description: Amount of the discounts applied to all items in the cart. This is a negative number.  This also includes the order level discounts.

shippingTotal.description: Shipping does not appear on cart.

shippingTaxTotal.description: Not implemented. Tax does not appear on cart.

itemTaxTotal.description: Not implemented. Tax does not appear on cart.

taxTotal.description: Tax does not appear on cart.

feeTotal.description: Not implemented. Total cost of fees for all items in the cart.

total.description: Final total amount of the order including all discounts, shipping, and tax.

lineItemSubtotalWithOrderAdjustments.description: Line Item Subtotals with Order Adjustments

shippingAmountBeforeDiscountsAndAdjustme.description: Shipping Amount before discount and adjustments

lastValidationDate.description:
Occasionally the commerce runtime may validate that item/product names, descriptions, and prices have not changed. 
If changed, it updates LastValidationDate.

expirationDate.description:
When the order will no longer be active. That is, the order is considered abandoned. 
Orders of anonymous shoppers expire after 14 days of inactivity. 
An order never expires for shoppers who are logged into their account. 
Date in UTC Date/Time.

changeMessages.description: List of messages displayed by the system based on the last cart action, for example, when a product price has changed or is out-of-stock. System-supplied and read-only.

extendedProperties.description: Extra properties (key-value pairs) that extend the primary object. Think of this as a property bag of string keys and string values.

discountThresholdMessages.description: List of Mozu.CommerceRuntime.Contracts.Commerce.ThresholdMessage objects that are valid for the current value of the cart/order.

isPackagedStandAlone.description: Indicates that this product ships by itself.

allocationId.description: Allocation ID associated with this product on this order.

allocationExpiration.description: Allocation ID associated with this product on this order.

name.description: Name of the product option that appears with the order item in the language specified by LocaleCode.

Pricelist entry mode of the product.

1. null : Product doesn't participate in pricelist

3. Simple:

quantity.description: Quantity of the product included in the bundle.

creditValue.description: Credit value.  Only populated if the bundled product is a gift card or digital credit

upc.description: Universal Product Code of the product.

sku.description: Product Identifier specific to the store

variationProductCode.description: For configurable products, the unique identifier of the product variation that has been selected.

options.description: If the product contains configurable or stand-alone options, the list of product options that the shopper selected for this product.

properties.description: If the product contains properties, the list of properties that the shopper selected for this product.

categories.description: Categories to which this product belongs.

isRecurring.description: If true, the product is purchased or fulfilled at regular intervals, for example, a monthly billing or a subscription.

isTaxable.description: If true, the product is eligible for tax.

productType.description: Type of product, which can be a product with configurable options, a product with stand-alone options, or a simple product with no options.

productUsage.description: Usage of the product, primarily used to indicate a bundle in this context

bundledProducts.description: Products bundled with this product (if the current product is a bundle)

fulfillmentFields.description: List of unique product identifiers for an item on shipment

overrideAmount.description: Amount as manually overridden by the Merchant

discountQuantity.description: The number of the line item that can be used for this particular discount.
