usages.description: Usages are arbitratry sting values used to provide instructions for other applications as to the intended areas where the view should be used. Mozu uses the "admin" usage valued to indicate that a ListView should appear in the EntityManager in the Admin UI.  The values are open ended and applications may provide any value for a usage. This field can be used in queries to the EntityList.

metaData.description: An arbitrary json property to be used by external applications for any purpose. MZDB will persist and retrieve the metadata without any restrictions.

security.description: less restrictive than collection/list security. public | admin | owner

filter.description: Indicates a implicitly applied filter to the EntityList for to which the ListView is associated. All queries to the ListView will have this filter applied implicitly.

defaultSort.description: Indicates a default sort to be applied to the ListView.

fields.description: The list of ViewFields for this view. ViewFields can be used to filter or transform the underlying Entity to provide an optimized format for applications which query the ListView.  If no ViewFields are specified, entities will be returned for the View with no transform applied.

nameSpace.description: The nameSpace for the EntityList which must be within the nameSpace scope of the developer Account for the creating application.  The name and namespace are formatted as name@nameSpace when specified as fullName. An EntityLists fullName must be unique within the tenant in which it is created.

name.description: The name for the EntityList which must be unique within the namespace provided.  The name and namespace are formatted as name@nameSpace when specified as fullName. An EntityLists fullName must be unique within the tenant in which it is created.

contextLevel.description: At which context level are entities stored in the list. Possible values are "tenant", "site", "masterCatalog" or "catalog".  Each list instance will exist at this context level for the tenant.

useSystemAssignedId.description: Indicates whether or not Mozu should assign a generated identifier for each entity in the list or whether a unique identifier will be provided for each identity. If set to false, then a value must be provided for the IdProperty for the list.

isVisibleInStorefront.description: Indicates whether Enitities in the EntityList are allowed to be accessed from a Mozu storefront.

isLocaleSpecific.description: Indicates whether MZDB should store entities in the EntityList instance specific to the localeCode provided.  If true, all operations on the EntityList will be filtered by the provided localeCode on the request or using the defautLocaleCode for the context.  All entities created in the EntityList will be stored with the localeCode provided on the request or the defautLocaleCode for the context as an additional implicit key. The default value is false.

isShopperSpecific.description: Indicates whether MZDB should store entities in the EntityList instance specific to the current shopper on the request.  If true, all operations on the EntityList will be filtered by the id of the shopper from the shopper claims provided on the request.  All entities created in the EntityList will be stored with the id of the shopper from the shopper claims provided on the request as an additional implicit key. The default value is false.

isSandboxDataCloningSupported.description: Indicates whether MZDB should clone all of the Entities in the EntityList when cloning an existing sandbox for which this list is already defined.  The default value is false.

views.description: The ListViews defined for this EntityList.  ListViews may be used to automatically filter an EntityList or transform the Entities in the list to a new Schema.

usages.description: Usages are arbitratry sting values used to provide instructions for other applications as to the intended areas where the list should be used. Mozu uses the "admin" usage valued to indicate that an EntityList should appear in the EntityManager in the Admin UI.  The values are open ended and applications may provide any value for a usage. This field can be used in queries to the EntityList.

metadata.description: An arbitrary json property to be used by external applications for any purpose. MZDB will persist and retrieve the metadata without any restrictions.

EntityList.description: The definition of an MZDB EntityList which describes the characteristics of the EntityList on a per tenant basis. EntityLists are created at the tenant level, but instances of the EntityLists are implicitly created at the appropriate context level as entities are added or removed from the EntityList.

deliveryDate.description: Date at which this inventory will become available. Expected format '2020-09-28T12:00:00-0500'

type.description: Type of future inventory update: 0 is refresh, 1 is update.

ApiDocumentationTagQuantity.title: TagQuantity

allocated.description: The quantity the location has that are already allocated for this tag

available.description: The quantity the location has that are available for purchase for this tag

onHand.description: The quantity the the location has in its possession for this tag

pending.description: The quantity the location has that are pending for this tag

tags.description: Associative Map of <String, String> for tagCategoryName => tagName

ApiDocumentationTagQuantity.description: Response object for a tag quantity

allocated.description: The quantity the location has that are already allocated.

available.description: The quantity the location has that are available for purchase

blockAssignment.description: Whether or not the product is blocked for assignment

countryCode.description: The country code of this location

currencyID.description: The currency identifier for the retailPrice

directShip.description: Whether this location can ship to a consumer

distance.description: The distance in miles from this location to the item's destination

floor.description: Absolute minimum quantity of this item that should be in stock at any time

inventoryLocatorName.description: The inventory locator name of the individual item

ltd.description: Custom field used for store prioritization

onHand.description: The quantity the location has in its possession

pending.description: The quantity the location has that are pending.

pickup.description: Whether a consumer can pick up product at this location (store)

retailPrice.description: The price of the product at this location

safetyStock.description: Quantity of this item the location wants to keep in stock to ensure stock isn't completely depleted

transferEnabled.description: Whether the location can ship to another location (store), thus restocking that location.

CatalogAdminsAttributeMetadataItem.description: Attribute Metadata Item.  It can be utilized for storing abitrary key/value pairs of data related to an attribute.

localeCode.description: Language used for the attribute name and description. Currently, only en_US is supported.

name.description: Name of the attribute in the language specified by LocaleCode.

description.description: Description of the attribute in the language specified by LocaleCode.

CatalogAdminsAttributeLocalizedContent.description: Container for language-specific content to display on the storefront. You'll have a container for each supported language (LocaleCode). This enables you to display an attribute in multiple languages yet manage it as a single attribute internally.

regularExpression.description: Regular expression to run against the attribute value. This should follow JavaScript/EMCA's Regular Expression syntax.

minStringLength.description: For validating strings, minimum length allowed for a string.

maxStringLength.description: For validating strings, maximum length allowed for a string.

minNumericValue.description: For validating Number attribute value, minimum number allowed.

maxNumericValue.description: For validating Number attribute value, maximum number allowed.

minDateValue.description: For validating a DateTime attribute value, minimum datetime allowed.

maxDateValue.description: For validating a DateTime attribute value, maximum datetime allowed.

localeCode.description: Language used for the string attribute value. Currently, only en_US is supported.

stringValue.description: Localized Value in the language of the locale code

valueSequence.description: Read only System generated monotonically increasing unique sequence.

value.description:
The actual value of the attribute vocabulary. This value must be unique within the vocabulary for a single attribute and match the datatype of the attribute. 
String data type requires a canonical value here or one will be system generated if null. The actual string content displayed to users should be stored as Content. 
String values require content to be present.
Once this value is set it cannot be changed.

mappedGenericValues.description:
The actual values of the related generic attribute. This value must match the datatype of the attribute and already exist 
within the Vocabulary values of the related ValueMappingAttribute. Only supporting string at this time.

productName.description: The ProductName when the Attribute DataType is ProductCode.

localizedContent.description: The Content of an attribute value. This content is in multiple locals supported by the master catalog and is only valid for String DataType.

displayOrder.description: The order in which the attribute value displays. If you omit a value for this property, Mozu infers the display order from the attribute value's position the list.

searchableInStorefront.description: Indicates whether the attribute value should be searchable on the public storefront.

searchableInAdmin.description: Indicates whether the attribute value should be searchable in the merchant catalog admin.

searchDisplayValue.description:
If true, the system will index the display value of string attributes instead of the canonical value for searching. 
The canonical value will always be used for filtering. Does not apply for for non-string attributes.

allowFilteringAndSortingInStorefront.description: Indicates whether the attribute should be able to be used in filters, facets, and sorting on the public storefront.

indexValueWithCase.description:
Indicates whether the attribute value is case sensative for filtering and faceting. This applies to Text Admin entered attributes. 
A null value means it is not case sensative

customWeightInStorefrontSearch.description: Indicates whether the attribute is indevidually stored as a tokenized field in search for custom term search weight

AttributeSearchSettings.description: Attribute Search Settings. A container for all of the search and indexing settings of an Attribute

adminName.description: Name of the product displayed in the admin, This field does not need to be unqiue, but is required. It can include spaces...and is limited to a length of 50.

namespace.description:
NameSpace, each application creating attributes will have a uniqe namespace to avoid name (Code) collisions. The namespace provided must be a valid registered
namespace. If no namespace is specified it is assumed to be the namespace of the Tenant.

attributeCode.description:
Unique identifier of the Attribute. Must be unique within a namespace and cannot be changed once the attribute is created. This value will be generated and match the attribute
sequence if not provided on create.

attributeFQN.description: Attribute fully qualified name, Read only value that combines namespace and attribute code as NameSpace~AttributeCode

isValueMappingAttribute.description: Specifies if this attribute can can be used to generalize values of another attribute

valueMappingAttributeFQN.description: Attribute fully qualified name of a corresponding value mapping atribuite

attributeSequence.description: Read only System generated monotonically increasing unique sequence for each attribute created.

attributeDataTypeSequence.description: Read only System generated monotonically increasing unique sequence for each attribute,DataType created (this is used to optimize indexed field names in search).

masterCatalogId.description: Indentifier of the master that this attribute is a member of. System-supplied and read-only. Attributes will be created in the MasterCatalog of the supplied context.

inputType.description:
The InputType type of the attribute. Must be a valid value for InputType defined in InputTypeConst and the combination of types set must match an entry in the AttributeTypeRules resource. 
This value cannot be changed after create

valueType.description:
The ValueType of the attribute.  Must be a valid value for ValueType defined in ValueTypeTypeConst and the combination of types set must match an entry in the AttributeTypeRules resource. 
This value cannot be changed after create

dataType.description:
The DataType of the attribute.  Must be a valid value for DataType defined in DataTypeTypeConst and the combination of types set must match an entry in the AttributeTypeRules resource. 
This value cannot be changed after create

isOption.description: Specifies if this attribute can have a usage type of Option in a ProductType. This value can only be true when when it matches an AttributeTypeRule in the AttributeTypeRules resource.

isExtra.description: Specifies if this attribute can have a usage type of Extra in a ProductType. This value can only be true when when it matches an AttributeTypeRule in the AttributeTypeRules resource.

isProperty.description: Specifies if this attribute can have a usage type of Property in a ProductType. This value can only be true when when it matches an AttributeTypeRule in the AttributeTypeRules resource.

attributeMetadata.description: Attribute Metadata. This list can contain opaque data (key value pairs) that can be used as a property bag for UI concerns.

localizedContent.description: The Content of an attribute. This content is always in the default language of the MasterCatalog.

vocabularyValues.description: The list of Values for this attribute. Only available for ValueType:PredefinedVocabulary

id.description: Unique identifier of the image. System-supplied and read-only.

localeCode.description: Language used for the image content.

imageLabel.description: Image title that appears on the storefront.

altText.description: Descriptive text associated with the image or video that appears on the storefront.

cmsId.description: Id of the image in the CMS.

videoUrl.description: URL of a video associated with the category.

mediaType.description: Type of media. Used by the client to determine how to render the image or video or what have you.

sequence.description: For categories with multiple images, the order in which this image appears on the storefront.

CategoryLocalizedImage.description: Contains the image label and alternate text for a category image or video in the language specified by LocalCode.

categoryImages.description: List of images associated with the category.

name.description: Name of the category.

description.description: Description of the category to display on the storefront.

pageTitle.description: Title that appears at the top of new pages.

localeCode.description: Lanugage used for category content. Currently, only en_US is supported.

metaTagTitle.description: Metadata title. Metadata can be used to manage information internally. Sometimes used for SEO.

metaTagDescription.description: Metadata description. Metadata can be used to manage information internally. Sometimes used for SEO.

metaTagKeywords.description: Metadata keywords. Metadata can be used to manage information internally. Sometimes used for SEO.

slug.description:
Human-readable identifier that you can give to the category to create friendly URLs. For example, 
instead of "http: //example.com/products?category=2&id=25," the friendly URL can be "http: //example.com/products/category/2/25."

CategoryLocalizedContent.description: Container for language-specific content to display on the storefront. You'll have a container for each supported language (LocaleCode). This enables you to display a category in multiple languages yet manage it as a single category internally.

logicalOperator.description: And or Or (if Container with More than one Node)

left.description: The field target of a predicate

right.description: The literal values of a predicate

id.description: Internal unique identifier of the category. System-supplied and read-only.

categoryType.description: The Type of Category Static, Dyanmic, DynamicPreComputed

catalogId.description: The CatalogId that the category belongs to.

parentCategoryId.description: Unique identifier of the category to which this category belongs. If nil, this is a top-level category. System-supplied and read-only.

categoryCode.description: External unique identifier of the category.

isActive.description: If false, the category is considered unavailable in runtime (default is true if not specified on create)

isDisplayed.description: If true, the category appears to shoppers on the storefront.

sequence.description: Order in which categories appear when they are at the same level (siblings). For example, you could change the sequence of categories so that a specific category always appears first.

productCount.description: Number of products contained in this category. This count includes all products contained in any subcategories of this category.

childCount.description: Number of subcategories that belong to this category. These subcategories are at the same level (siblings).

shouldSlice.description: If True, search displays sliced view

CatalogAdminsCategoryPagedCollection.description: Collection of categories where categories are returned in a series of pages.

CatalogAdminsCategoryCollection.description: Collection of categories returned as a whole. A collection is not paged.

id.description: Internal unique identifier of the couponset. System-supplied and read-only.

couponSetCode.description:
Unique tenant supplied identifier.
Used as the prefix for generated sets.
Required
System generated if left null.

name.description: CouponSet Name

couponCodeType.description:
Determines if the coupon is a persisted list of codes (static) or a list based on generated specification
(dynamic).

status.description:
CouponSet status which can be: Active, Expired,  Inactive
System-supplied and read-only.

canBeDeleted.description:
Signifies that the coupon has not been exported and can be updated
ReadOnly

maxRedemptionsPerUser.description:
Maximum number of times any single user can redeem any code.
Must be null, >=1 or -1.
Defaults to 1 on creation if null.
-1 indicates unlimited.

maxRedemptionsPerCouponCode.description:
Maximum number of times any code can de used.
Must be null, >=1 or -1.
Defaults to 1 on creation if null.
-1 indicates unlimited.

endDate.description: Date and time that the coupon codes becomes expired

startDate.description: Date and time that the coupon codes becomes active

setSize.description:
Sets the number of codes to generate for dynamic coupons
Required when CouponCodeType is "Dynamic"

couponCodeCount.description:
Count of associated couponCodes.
Must use "counts" response group to get this value
ReadOnly

redemptionCount.description: ReadOnly count of all redemptions for this coupon set.

assignedDiscountCount.description:
ReadOnly sum of all redemptions for this coupon.
Use "counts" response group.

CouponSet.description: Represents a claimable item that allows a user to use one or more discounts.

couponSetId.description: ReadOnly system id for releated couponset.

couponCode.description: The code the customer uses to claim this coupon

redemptionCount.description:
Total number of times this code has been redeemed. ReadOnly, calculated.
Only returned with response group includeCounts

discountId.description: Discount Id for the associated discount

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places to round to

CurrencyLocalization.description: A currency and some localization options

multiplier.description: An additional multiplier to use in calculations

referenceData.description: Reference data for miscellaneous metadata from updates

CatalogAdminsCurrencyExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between two currencies

localeCode.description: Lanugage used for the discount in the current catalog. Defaults setting for the active catalog.

name.description: Name of the discount.

friendlyDescription.description: Promotional text or HTML that can be utilized as friendly content like "Buy this product now and get X!"

DiscountLocalizedContent.description:
Container for the language-specific name of the discount. You will have a container for each supported language
(LocaleCode).
This enables you to display the discount name in multiple languages yet manage it as a single discount internally.

categoryId.description: Unique identifier of the category to which the discount condition applies.

CategoryDiscountCondition.description: Represents a product category and quantity constraint

productCode.description: Product code of the product to discount.

ProductDiscountCondition.description: Represents a product and quantity constraint

id.description:
The Customer segment Id.
This is the  system Id not the code.

maxRedemptionCount.description: Maximum number of times that the discount can be redeemed. Default is null (no limit to discount redemptions).

requiresCoupon.description: If true, the shopper needs to enter a coupon code to redeem the discount.

couponCode.description: Code of the coupon associated with the discount (if a coupon code is required). The merchant can supply the code or the system can generate it.

requiresAuthenticatedUser.description:
Determines is this discount can be used by an anonymous user 
Defaults to false to allow discounts for anonymous users.

includedPaymentWorkflows.description: List of payment types that trigger this discount to be valid.

includedCategories.description: List of categories that must be purchased in order for the discount to be valid.

excludedCategories.description: List of categories to discount. When a discount applies to a category, all products in the category are discounted.

includedProducts.description: List of products that are eligible for the discount.

excludedProducts.description: List of products that are eligible for the discount.

customerSegments.description: List of customer groups for which the discount applies

minimumQuantityRequiredProducts.description:
Minimum quantity of products in the specified IncludedProducts that must be purchased to
qualify for the associated discount.
Defaults to 1 if  null and IncludedProducts has values.

minimumQuantityProductsRequiredInCategor.description:
Minimum quantity of products in the categories specified in IncludedCategories that must be purchased to
qualify for the associated discount.
Defaults to 1 if  null and IncludedCategories has values

minimumOrderAmount.description:
Only applies to order.
Minimum order subtotal after discounts in order for the associated discount to be applied

maximumOrderAmount.description:
Only applies to order.
Maximum order subtotal after discounts in order for the associated discount to be applied

categoriesToExcludeFromMinOrderTotal.description: List of categories to discount. When a discount applies to a category, all products in the category are discounted.

productsToExcludeFromMinOrderTotal.description: List of products that are eligible for the discount.

minimumLifetimeValueAmount.description: Minimum lifetime value amount required for this discount to apply

startDate.description: Date when the discount can goes into effect, in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

expirationDate.description: Date when the discount expires. Default is null (no expiration date).

minimumCategorySubtotalBeforeDiscounts.description:
Minimum amount that must be purchased in the combined categories defined in 
IncludedCategories.  Amount is calculated before discounting.
Not used if IncludedCategories is empty.

minimumRequiredQuantityPerRedemption.description: Defines a minimum quantity that is required for a target only discount

validSubscriptionFrequencies.description: List of subscription frequencies to which the discount will apply.

validSubscriptionContinuityOrdinals.description: Ordinals at which a continuity order should receive the discount.

minDistinctProductsRequired.description:
The minimum number of distinct products on the order
Not a quantity calculation.

minTotalOrderQuantity.description:
The order must contain at least this total quantity of items for the discount to apply.
You must buy a combined quantity of at least x amount.

CatalogAdminsDiscountCondition.description:
Specifies constraints that must be satified for a discount to be applied to a target.
Constraints are Anded together

id.description: Unique identifier of the category to which the discount applies.

TargetedCategory.description: Category to discount. When a discount applies to a category, all products in the category are discounted.

productCode.description: Product code of the product to discount.

code.description:
Unique identifier of the shipping method as it appears in the SiteShippingMethod property of the Shipping Settings
resource.

name.description: Name of the shipping method as it appears in SiteShippingMethodLocalizedContent of the Shipping Settings resource.

TargetedShippingMethod.description:
Shipping method that is eligible for free shipping. This is the shipping method that is defined with the Shipping
Settings resource.

zone.description:
Indicates the shipping zone that this discount is valid for.  If zone is provided the
method selected must be valid for the zone and both populated in the order for the discount
to be valid.

TargetedShippingZone.description:
Shipping method that is eligible for free shipping. This is the shipping method that is defined with the Shipping
Settings resource.

type.description:
Type of target to which the discount applies. Possible values: 
Product
or 
Shipping
. If this is a 
Product
type, you can specify which products or categories that the discount applies to. If this is a 
Shipping
type then you must specify which shipping methods apply.

includeAllProducts.description: If yes, the discount applies to all products sold on the storefront.

includedCategoriesOperator.description:
Applies to Included categories
When Any, the target product can belong to any specified category.
When All, the target product must belong to all specified categories.
Defaults to Any

categories.description: List of categories to discount. When a discount applies to a category, all products in the category are discounted.

excludedCategoriesOperator.description:
Applies to Included categories
Defaults to Any

excludedCategories.description: List of categories to exclude from the discount. Useful to exclude specific child categories.

products.description: List of products that are eligible for the discount.

excludedProducts.description: List of products that are excluded from the discount.

excludeItemsWithExistingShippingDiscount.description:
Prevents order scoped discounts from layering over items that already have a shipping discount with the 
same type.

excludeItemsWithExistingProductDiscounts.description:
Prevents order scoped discounts from layering over items that already have a product discount with the 
same type.

shippingMethods.description: Shipping method that is eligible for shipping discounts. This is a shipping method defined in Shipping Settings.

shippingZones.description: Shipping Zones that are applicable for this discount

maximumQuantityPerRedemption.description:
When a condition is specified, this property limits the number of items that can be targeted per discount redemption with an order.
if multiple redemptions are allowed per order then multiples of this value would be allowed in multiples of the associated 
condition.
If no condition is specified then this value is not used.  
If null and condition exists, then defaults to 1.

appliesToLeastExpensiveProductsFirst.description:
Determines which way the discount is optimized.  Consumers favor(default - false/null) or tenants favor (when this is set to true)
Applies to discounts where target is not a specific product or list of products.  
May also impact behavior of Buy X Get Y so that X is the most expensive items and Y the least expensive.

CatalogAdminsDiscountTarget.description:
What to discount. Specifies the type of discount (percentage off, monetary amount, or free shipping) and which products, categories, or shipping methods are eligible for the discount.
Can also specify the minimum amount that the order must total for the discount to apply.

localeCode.description: Language used for the discount in the current catalog. Defaults setting for the active catalog.

messageTemplate.description: Locale-based contents of the Threshold Message.

discountId.description: Unique identifier of the discount. System-supplied and read-only.

thresholdValue.description: The cart total amount that must be met before the threshold message is displayed

isActive.description: Indicates if threshold messages are active for this discount

showInCart.description: Indicates if the threshold message will display in the cart

showOnCheckout.description: Indicates if the threshold message will display on the checkout page

requiresCouponCode.description: Indicates if the threshold message will display when a promo code is evaluated

id.description: Unique identifier of the discount. System-supplied and read-only.

scope.description: Scope to which the discount applies, valid values are: Order, LineItem

currentRedemptionCount.description: How many times this discount has been redeemed. System-supplied and read-only.

amount.description:
Amount of the discount, as a percentage or monetary amount, for example 15% or $15.
Must be either null or greater than zero.

amountType.description:
Type of discount, which can be either a percentage off the price, 
a specific monetary amount, or free. 
Possible values: 
	Percentage 
	Amount 
	Free
	FixedPrice

status.description: Discount status which can be "Active," "Scheduled," or "Expired." System-supplied and read-only.

canBeDeleted.description: Signifies that the discount is not referenced and can be hard deleted

doesNotApplyToSalePrice.description:
Determines if the discount should apply to sale price or regular price only.
Discounts will apply to sale prices by default.
Only applies to LineItem product discounts.

doesNotApplyToProductsWithSalePrice.description:
Determines whether or not a discount applies to a items with a sale price.  Applicable 
on order and line item discounts.  For line items, when this is true, the discount will 
be disqualified.  For order level discounts, when true, the discount will not be applied 
to those items have a sale price.

maximumUsesPerUser.description:
Maximum number of times a user can redeem this discount.
 Must be either null or greater than zero.

maximumDiscountImpactPerOrder.description:
Maximum impact this discount can apply on a single order.
 Must be either null or greater than zero.

maximumDiscountImpactPerRedemption.description:
Maximum impact this discount can apply on a single line item.
 Must be either null or greater than zero.

maximumRedemptionsPerOrder.description:
Maximum number of redemptions allowed per order.
If null, defaults to unlimited.

includedPriceLists.description:
Products receiving a price from a price list specified here or a child of a specified 
price list can be discounted.

doesNotApplyToMultiShipToOrders.description:
Flag to allow or prevent application to multi-ship-to orders,
Only applicable to shipping discounts.

isBxGx.description:
Readonly property indicating that the condition required purchase is the 
same as the target items.  Used in BxGx and BoGo type discounts.

canBeStackedUpon.description: Indicates whether or not stacking is enabled for this discount

stackingLayer.description: Indicates which stacking layer this discount is a part of

preventLineItemShippingDiscounts.description:
Prevents Line Item Shipping discounts from being applied when a Line Item Product  
discount has been applied

preventOrderProductDiscounts.description:
Prevents Order Product discounts from being applied when a Line Item Product  
or Shipping discount has been applied

preventOrderShippingDiscounts.description:
Prevents Order Shipping discounts from being applied when a Line Item Product/Shipping  
or Order Product discount has been applied

hasPurchaseConditions.description:
Indicates if this discount has purchase conditions that must be met before 
the discount is applied

purchaseRequirementType.description:
The type of purchase requirement for this discount, either purchase conditions and targets which   
Supports BoGo, and BxGx scenarios. Or Target only that only have a target and no purchase conditions

isSubscriptionDiscount.description: Determines how discounts will be evaluated for subscription items and during continuity orders.

CatalogAdminsDiscount.description:
Allows you to define and manage discounts to apply to your products, product categories, or orders. The discounts can be a specified monetary amount off the price, percentage off the price, or for free shipping.
You can create a coupon code that applies to the discount.

DiscountCollection.description: Collection of discounts returned as a whole. A collection is not paged.

DiscountTagCollection.description: Collection of discounts returned as a whole. A collection is not paged.

tagCode.description: A unique code per catalog. Limit 500 characters.

tagName.description: Readonly and computed from TagCode. If using hierarchical tag-codes, only the last node

tagPath.description: Readonly and computed from TagCode. If using hierarchical tag-codes, the node path without the TagName

CatalogAdminsTag.description: A generic tag that can be used for any purpose.

TagCollection.description: Collection of Tags returned as a whole. A collection is not paged.

stackingEnabled.description: Indicates if discount stacking is enabled for discounts in this catalog

productOrderLayers.description: Number of Product Order discount layers

productLineItemLayers.description: Number of Product Line Item discount layers

usePostDiscountedOrderValue.description: Use the pre or post line item discounts order total to evaluate the order minimum constraint

id.description: Name of field, or FQN of attribute

type.description:
The type of source field used by the facet. Allowable values are: Element, Attribute. 
Must be a valid value for DataType defined in FacetFieldTypeConst.

name.description: Read-only system-generated label for the source field.

dataType.description: Read-only system-generated DataType of the Attribute or Element source field. Will be valid value for DataType defined in DataTypeConst.

allowsRangeQuery.description: Read-only system-generated indicator of whether the source field supports RangeQuery type facets.

facetId.description: The unique identifier for the facet definition

facetType.description:
The type of facet. Allowable values are: Value, RangeQuery 
Must be a valid value for DataType defined in FacetTypeConst.

order.description: Used to order the display of the facets within a section

categoryId.description: The category that the facet is being configured at

categoryCode.description: The category that the facet is being configured at

valueSortType.description:
Determines how the facet values will be sorted in the store. 
Must be a valid value for DataType defined in FacetValueSortTypeConst. 
Allowable values are: CountAscending, CountDescending, ValuesAscending, ValuesDescending, AttributeDefinition, AttributeDefinitionDescending.
The default if no value is specified will be CountDescending.

overrideFacetId.description: The ID of a parent category's facet being overriden

isHidden.description: Indicates whether the facet is hidden for the given category

rangeQueries.description: List of ranges if the Facet is of type Range

available.description: Facets that are not configured, but COULD BE!

id.description: MasterCatalogId (readonly)

name.description: Name of the MasterCatalog (readonly)

productPublishingMode.description: The product publishing mode of this MasterCatalog

enableLiveEdit.description: If the publishingMode is Pending and LiveEditsEnabled = true, DataViewMode live can be passed in the header and live products can be directly edited.

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether the MasterCatalog has been deleted and should no longer be used

priceListCode.description: External unique identifier of the PriceList. Must be unique an only contain url sanitized characters. Max length is 50

parentPriceListCode.description: Parent PriceList code, Can be null for root level priceLists

parentPriceListName.description: Parent PriceList name, Can be null for root level priceLists. Read only in contract.

name.description: Name of the priceList. Max length is 100

description.description: Description of the price list. Max length is 300

enabled.description: Is the price list enabled and valid in the storefront. Default is true.

filteredInStorefront.description: When true, only products with valid price list entries will be visible in the storefront. Default is false

validForAllSites.description: When true, no valid sites need to be specifiied. Price list is considered valid for all sites. Default is true

validSites.description: When ValidForAllSites = false, a list of siteIDs that the price list is valid for should be supplied

mappedCustomerSegments.description:
List of customer segment code associated with this price list.
Used to resolve default price list

rank.description: Used to prioritize price list resolution when more than 1 price list maps

resolvable.description:
Determines if this price list can be resolved as the current price list 
within a session.

If IsActive is false then the product variation is not for sale--either because it was never a product offering or it was permanently dropped. IsActive is not intended for temporary unavailability. Default is false.

For example, if the merchant stopped selling all "small" shirts, all product variations with the "small" option are set to IsOrphan. System-supplied and read-only.

A merchant can create this code to easily recognize a product variation. By default, the system creates this code by appending a number to the base product. After the merchant supplies this code, it becomes read-only.

Using this resource, the system creates a matrix of all possible combinations of the product options and the merchant confirms which variations match products for sale. For example, a T-shirt with three color and three size options has nine possible product variations. The system keeps track of inventory for each variation.

searchDisplayValue.description:
If true, the system will index the display value of string attributes instead of the canonical value for searching. 
The canonical value will always be used for filtering. Does not apply for for non-string attributes.

allowFilteringAndSortingInStorefront.description: Indicates whether the attribute should be able to be used in filters, facets, and sorting on the public storefront.

indexValueWithCase.description: Indicates whether the attribtue value is indexed with case or not

customWeightInStorefrontSearch.description: Indicates whether the attribtue value is indexed so that it can have a custom relevency weight compared to other attributes in a tokenized text search

displayIntention.description: Am optional hint to the theme about how this attribute should be displayed (what control to use)

AttributeDetail.description: Product Attribute properties common between a Product Propery, Option, and Extra

cmsId.description: Id of the image in the CMS.

colorValue.description: Hex Color value to display in a color picker

CatalogRuntimesAttributeVocabularyValueD.description: Product Attribute properties common between a Product Propery, Option, and Extra

stringValue.description: Localized Value in the language of the locale code

isHidden.description: Indicates whether the product property should be hidden from the customer

isMultiValue.description: Indicates whether it's possible for there to be more than one value in the Values field

CatalogRuntimesProductProperty.description: An attribute used as a property of a product

stringValue.description: Localized Value in the language of the locale code only available for dataType string

isEnabled.description: If true, this option is enabled and can be selected. During configuration, this returns false of this option value is invalid with other current selected options.

isSelected.description: If true, this is the option that is currently selected. It can be either the default value or one that the shopper has selected.

isDefault.description: If true, this is the default value that the merchant supplied.

deltaWeight.description: How much this option weighs above the weight of the product.

deltaPrice.description: How much this option costs above the cost of the product.

shopperEnteredValue.description: How much this option costs above the cost of the product.

isRequired.description: If true, the shopper must provide a value for the option before it can be purchased.

isMultiValue.description: If true, more than one value can be assigned to an option. Only possible with stand-alone options.

values.description: Possible choices for an option, for example, values of the option "Color" can be "red," "white," and "blue."

CatalogRuntimesProductOption.description: An option for a product and its list of values, if any. Also includes whether the option is configurable or stand-alone, whether it is required, whether it can have mulitple values and whether the shopper can supply its value (for example, engraved initials).

productCode.description: Merchant-created code associated with the variation product, for example, a SKU.

options.description: The combination of options that resolve to this variation product

VariationSummary.description: Details of a product, including its product code, name, description, options (if any), and current state--whether the product can be purchased given the options selected currently.

isPrimary.description: True if the collection is the primary collection for the containing product.

CatalogRuntimesProductCollectionMemberKe.description: This is the key of the product collection member.  For now, it's just product code, but may expand in future

ProductCollectionMember.description: List of products that belong to a product collection product.

productCode.description: Merchant-created code associated with the product, for example, a SKU.

purchaseLocation.description:
The location where the product is being purchased.. default is null. Products can have different prices
by purchaseLocation via custom priceListResolution....

productUsage.description: The UsageType of this product (Standard, Configurable, Bundle, Component, Collection)

fulfillmentTypesSupported.description: Indicates the fulfillment types the product supports.

goodsType.description: The GoodsType of the product (Physical, Digital, DigitalCredit....)

bundledProducts.description: The list of Bundled products included in this product. This is only populated when ProductUsage=Bundle

isActive.description: If true, the product exists. If not, the product should not appear in search results.

publishState.description: Represents the published state of the product returned. Valid values for ValueType are defined in PublishStateConst.

volumePriceBands.description: For products with bulk pricing... this will be populated with pricebands, depending on what options have been selected...

availableShippingDiscounts.description: List of potential shipping discounts available for this product.

isTaxable.description: If true, the product is subject to tax.

isRecurring.description: If true, the product can be purchased or fulfilled at regular intervals, for example, monthly billing or a subscription.

createDate.description: When the product was created with the product admin resource.

updateDate.description: When the product was last modified with the product admin resource.

upCs.description: UPC code of the products (populated for configurable products).

mfgPartNumbers.description: Manufacturer part numbers (populated for configurable products).

variationProductCode.description: When a configurable product has IsPurchasable=true on a GetProduct, this property will be populated for submission to cart.

categories.description: List of categories to which this product belongs.

isPackagedStandAlone.description: Is this product shipped in its own package

properties.description: List of product properties. These are attributes that might apply to multiple products, for example, price, size, manufacturer. These attributes cannot be configured by the shopper.

options.description:
List of the product's configurable options and extras. 
Includes whether an option is configurable (for example, a T-shirt) or an Extra (for example, monogram or gift-wrapping).

productImageGroups.description:
List of the image groups this product uses.
Image groups are used to map different images to different product options.
If the product doesn't have options then all images will be in the default
image group.

sliceValue.description: Readonly value of the selected value of the option corresponding to the Mozu.ProductRuntime.Contracts.Product.SlicingAttributeFQN

productCollections.description: List of product codes of product collections that this product is a member of.

productCollectionMembers.description:
list of member products that are part of the collection
This requires that the ProductUsage be set to Collection

score.description: The item's search engine relevancy score.

CatalogRuntimesProduct.description: Details of a product, including its product code, name, description, options (if any), and current state--whether the product can be purchased given the options selected currently.

nextCursorMark.description:
If a cursorMark is provided on the request, then the nextCursorMark will be populated on the response.
Provide this value as the cursorMark argument on the next request. If a cursorMark is provided on the request and the nextCursorMark value is null, then the end of the resultset was reached

attributeFQN.description: Fully Qualified Name of the selected option's attribute

attributeValueId.description: The unique ValueId of the Attribute (this can be sent as an alternative the to the AttributeFqn and Value)

shopperEnteredValue.description: Value that shopper entered if this is an Extra of VaolueType ShopperEntered.  This allows shopper data entry (such as the shopper's initials).

ProductOptionSelection.description: Name of the option that has been selected, and, if this is a stand-alone option, the value that the shopper entered.

variationProductCode.description: For a product with options, the code of the product variation that represents the current selection of product options.

options.description: List of the product options that the shopper has currently selected.

ProductOptionSelections.description: If the product has configurable options, the current state of the shopper's selections.

productCode.description: Merchant-created code associated with the product, for example, a SKU.

The location where the product is being purchased.. default is null. Products can have different prices
by purchaseLocation via custom priceListResolution....

fulfillmentTypesSupported.description: Indicates the fulfillment types the product supports.

variationProductCode.description:

options.description: Remaining options and option values that can be selected given the shopper's current selection of options.

properties.description: Remaining options and option values that can be selected given the shopper's current selection of options.

bundledProducts.description: The list of Bundled products included in this product. This is only populated when ProductUsage=Bundle

variationProductCode.description: For a product with options, the code of the product variation that represents the current selection of product options.

isPackagedStandAlone.description: Is this product shipped in its own package

productShortDescription.description: Brief description of the product typically used when the product is displayed in a list or search results.

categories.description: Categories to which the product belongs.

isTaxable.description: If true, the product listed on the live order is subject to tax.

DiscountValidationSummary.description: Provides a summary (more accurately it is a container) for valid discounts for potentially valid discounts for a product

LocationInventory.description: The inventory for a product at a specific Location

LocationInventoryQuery.description: The inventory for a product at a specific Location

CatalogRuntimesProductCost.description: The inventory for a product at a specific Location

suggestionType.description:
The type of Suggestion (e.g. Term, Product, Category). 
Will be one of the values of the SuggestionTypeConst type.

suggestion.description:
A suggested entity based on the search query. Use the SuggestionType to determine the type of entity.
Could be a SearchTerm, Product, or Category

SearchSuggestion.description: A suggested result based on the search query

name.description: Group Name

query.description: Text that the shopper types in a search query.

SearchSuggestionResult.description: List of items to suggest to the shopper who is entering a search query, for example, a search box on the storefront.

ProductSearchRandomAccessCursor.description: A calculated set of cursor marks for a given query that can be accessed in any order, providing the ability to page through all results in random/paralellized order

isApplied.description: True if this FacetValue was supplied as a facet value filter in the current search

count.description: Number of occurrences of FacetValue in result set.

filterValue.description: Submit this as a facet value filter

isDisplayed.description: Indicates whether the FacetValue should be displayed

CatalogRuntimesFacet.description: For faceted searches, name of the facet and list of facet values. For example, a facet called "Brands" may have the facet values "Apple," "Motorola," and "Samsung."

ProductSearchResult.description: Products and facets returned from search criteria supplied in a ProductSearch query.

FindProductsPreviewParameters.description: This should follow the immutable DTO pattern

ProductSearchPreviewResult.description: Products and search information returned for search preview query.

CartSettings.description: Cart settings defined for this site.

areGatewayCredentialFieldsSet.description: Returns true if Gateway CredentialsField is set. For security purposes, Gateway subresource CredentialFields will not be returned.

supportedCards.description: Which credit cards the Merchant supports

siteGatewaySupportedCards.description: Which credit cards the Merchant supports

displayName.description: The displayable name of this credential field

apiName.description: The name of this credential that should be used for web requests.

value.description: The value for this credential that should be used for web requests.

inputType.description: The input field type for the value.

ThirdPartyCredentialField.description: Describes the name and value of a third party credential field.

name.description: Should be one of Contracts.Constants.ThirdPartyWorkflowNames.

description.description:
Information about this definition for display purposes in the 'Payment and Checkout Settings'
admin ui.  This field may contain valid html tags

isLegacy.description:
Indicates if this is a legacy implementation using ARC only
or using the new extensible implementation.

ExternalPaymentWorkflowDefinition.description:
This class describes credentials and enablement for the various third-party payment workflows that we will integrate with.
Examples include Paypal Express, Amazon Payments, Google Wallet, etc.

code.description: A unique code for purchase order payment term

label.description: Memo field label that appers on the store front

isEnabled.description: Whether this memo field is enabled

isRequired.description: Whether this memo field is mandatory to be filled in when placing an order

allowSplitPayment.description: Indicates whether another payment can be used with the purchase order

isEnabled.description: Specifies whether this job should run.

interval.description: How often this job should run in minutes.

OrderJob.description: Contains settings for a job that can run on a regular basis.

captureOn.description: Which shipment states or workflow statuses are considered eligible for capture.

FlexibleCaptureFlow.description: Specifies a pre-fulfilled shipment state that is eligible for capture.

FlexibleCapture.description: Contains settings specifying whether the auto-capture payment feature should consider pre-fulfilled shipments.

forceCaptureOnFirstCapture.description: Specifies whether all available funds should be collected once any shipment is ready for capture.

AutoCaptureJob.description: Contains settings for the auto-capture payment feature.

ForceCaptureJob.description: Contains settings for when payments should be auto-captured regardless of shipment status.

OrderJobSettings.description: Contains settings for the auto-capture payment feature.

PaymentSettings.description:
Payment gateway settings defined for this site. A payment gateway is an e-commerce application service provider that authorizes 
payments for e-businesses and online retailers. You can define multiple payment gateway settings but only one is active at a time. 
Authorize.net is the only payment gateway supported currently.

customerCheckoutType.description:
Checkout login setting. Value can be either "LoginOptional," where shoppers are prompted to sign in
but are not required to do so, or "LoginRequired," where shopppers must login before purchasing.

CustomerCheckoutSettings.description:
Checkout requirements for customers, for example, whether they must login before purchasing from your store. 
Other customized checkout requirements can be defined.

paymentProcessingFlowType.description:
Credit card payment authorization setting. Options can be authorize and charge the shopper's credit card when the order is placed, "AuthorizeAndCaptureOnOrderPlacement," 
authorize the shopper's credit card when the order is placed and charge the credit card when the shipped, "AuthorizeOnOrderPlacementAndCaptureOnOrderShipment," 
or authorize and charge the shopper's credit card for the full amount when the order is shipped, "AuthorizeAndCaptureOnOrderShipment."

useOverridePriceToCalculateDiscounts.description: Use the override price on products to calculate discounts

abandonedOrderThresholdInMinutes.description: Abandoned Order Threshold in minutes indicates the number of minutes until a pending order is considered abandoned.

giftCardProcessingType.description:
Gift card payment authorization setting. Options can be authorize and charge the shopper's credit card when the order is placed, "AuthorizeAndCaptureOnOrderPlacement," 
authorize the shopper's gift card when the order is placed and charge the gift card when it is shipped, "AuthorizeOnOrderPlacementAndCaptureOnOrderShipment," 
or authorize and charge the shopper's gift card for the full amount when the order is shipped, "AuthorizeAndCaptureOnOrderShipment."

giftCardRefundCreditProcessingType.description: GiftCrd Refund/Credit flow, wither to existing or new giftcard

thirdPartyPaymentSettings.description:
Order processing settings for Third party payments
Ex- ApplePay using AuthorizeOnOrderPlacementAndCaptureOnOrderShipment for processing orders

OrderProcessingSettings.description:
Order processing (credit card payment authorization) setting defined for this site. 
Can choose when the shoppers credit card is authorized and charged. Possibilities include, "authorize and charge the shopper's credit card for the full 
order amount when the order is placed," "authorize the shopper's credit card for the full amount when the order is placed and charge the credit card when the order is shipped," or 
"authorize and charge the shopper's credit card for the full amount when the order is shipped."

CheckoutSettings.description:
Checkout and payment settings defined for this site. Can set which payment gateway to use, whether a shopper is required to login to place an order,
when credit cards are authorized and charged (when the order is placed or shipped), and, in the future, 
whether the checkout page displays an option for shoppers to receive your email marketing campaigns.

amount.description: Site setting for the name that appears as the sender of the shipping origin.

SiteShippingHandlingFee.description: The site setting that specifies the store's handling fees

minimumValueThreshold.description: If set, this is exact amount a shipment must be greater than to trigger usage of the IsSignatureRequired property

SiteShippingSignatureRequirement.description: The site setting that specifies the store's handling fees

SiteShippingSettings.description:
Defines the site setting for the active shipping rate provider that rate provider calculates domestic and international shipping rates.
Your site may have multiple shipping rate providers, for example, FedEx, DHL, USPS. However, only one shipping rate provider can be active at the same time.

continuityOrderDateOffset.description: Specifies the number of days before the next order date to create the continuity order.

SubscriptionSettings.description: Subscription settings defined or this site

usageRestrictions.description:
Restricts the fields used by specific SOLR analyzer.
Originally developed for entity entraction/ aka noun_extraction
(e.g. searching for sofa tables should return tables, not sofas)

spellingFields.description: List of attributes used in the spelling dictionary

spellCorrectEnabled.description: Returns boolean if contains any SpellingFields members.

items.name: items
items.description: List of Items to search on

locationWhitelist.name: locationWhitelist
locationWhitelist.description: List of location codes that are allowed to be included in results

locationBlacklist.name: locationBlacklist
locationBlacklist.description: List of location codes that are NOT allowed to be included in results

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of results to return, defaults to 100 for most

ignoreSafetyStock.name: ignoreSafetyStock
ignoreSafetyStock.description: Whether to ignore the safety stock buffer put in place

includeNegativeInventory.name: includeNegativeInventory
includeNegativeInventory.description: Whether to allow items with negative inventory in the results

shippingLocation.name: shippingLocation
shippingLocation.description: Whether to limit results to locations that are shipping enabled

transferEnabled.name: transferEnabled
transferEnabled.description: Filter results by locations that have transfer enabled (true) or don't (false)

pickup.name: pickup
pickup.description: Filter results by locations that are pickup-enabled (true) or not (false)

includeInAggregate.name: includeInAggregate
includeInAggregate.description: Filter results by locations that have aggregate export enabled (true) or don't (false)

includeAttributes.name: includeAttributes
includeAttributes.description: Flag to include attributes or not
